title: Combining profiles
content: I had a desktop drive fail. While it was out for recovery I started using a different computer. About 5 weeks later, I now that I have the restored drive and its data from which I can restore the original profile with its address book, messages, and folder hierarchy. Will it possible to now import /combine the the email history from the second profile?
creator: atscomms

title: Thunderbird email defaults to select the next message
content: When I select emails to delete (move to Trash) Thunderbird deletes them BUT THEN automatically selects the next email in the list. If I don't notice that, and deselect it, that email gets deleted with the next batch. I've lost several emails this way. So, how do I get Thunderbird to stop selecting the next email after it deletes the ones that I selected. Nothing should be selected after an email is deleted. I don't see anything in the settings menu to do this. If this is a default feature, it's pretty dangerous and should be changed.
creator: woody8297

title: Thunderbird now has Local Folders and Templates confused
content: Suddenly last week, the behavior of my Local Folders emails changed. Double clicking caused a reply-to default, not an open in a new window default. All sub-folders seem to have this problem even new ones. Right clicking shows a menu where New Message From template is the default. No other accounts have this problem, but Local Folders is my main email area. Flags show the Inbox as an Inbox, not a Template. Opening a new subfolder under Local Folders indicates that Local Folders is renamed somehow as Templates somewhere in the underside of Thunderbird. I see threads about recent All Mail issues, but this seems different. I have also tried JustAnswers but am unsure that the issue will be fixed with just redoing the Inbox folder. I have also tried the Conifg Editor to change the default right click menus as recommended in various help forums but to no avail. It looks like some part of Thunderbird is handling Local Folders as before, but other parts are assuming it is a Templates folder with Templates characteristics, which it is not. Is there something else I should try?
creator: edhaser

title: The contents of my inbox disappeared!
content:
Hello

After a Thunderbird update today all the emails in my inbox suddenly disappeared, and I was left with the message saying that the inbox was empty! Hundreds of emails - among them quite a few very important ones - were simply gone! What do I do??? What has happened and how do I retrieve the missing messages? The funny thing is that it's only the inbox that has been emptied. The emails that my filters have sent to my alias-boxes are still there. I need my emails. Where have they gone??
creator: torden2

title: Think I'm have to abandon Thunderbird.
content: I know that nobody cares out there but I'd like to tell you so you understand why. Have used Thunderbird for quite a while. Recently, however, I have WAY too many mystery problems: server connections timing out or unavailable, disappearing emails, correspondents NOT getting my emails, me not getting their emails. I've had to reinstall and setup the program several times in the last few months. Each time, new problems. Really HATE to abandon independent developers/organizations in favor of commercial programs, but I need a app I can rely on. Gonna see how I do for another couple of weeks. Is there an app that can scan settings and flag problems? Program's getting fairly complicated. Remember Scotty, "The more they overthink the plumbing, the easier it is to stop up the drain."
creator: dalewebb1

title: E-mail-ek végleges törlése
content: A tárhely felszabadítása miatt az e-mail-ekből törölni szeretnék, viszont egy rövid idő után a rendszer a törölt email-eket visszatölti. Próbáltam, hogy miután kitöröltem kb. 1500 e-mail-t, újra indítottam a gépet, sajnos ennek ellenére is a rendszer vissza töltötte az általam kitörölt e-mail-eket. Mi lehet ennek az oka, és hogy tudnám a kijelölt email-eket véglegesen törölni?
creator: lajos.willingsdorfer

title: MESSAGGI POSTA NON VISUALIZZATI
content:
Buongiorno

espongo il mio problema per il quale spero possiate aiutarmi, nella mia azienda utilizziamo un account di posta elettronica aziendale di thunderbird, con la mail aziendale , solamente dal mio pc non riesco a visualizzare i messaggi di posta elettronica più vecchi di 15gg. L'archivio invece di farmi visualizzare tutti i messaggi di posta mi permette di vedere le mail in arrivo solamente dei precedenti 15gg. Questo è un problema che ho solo io dal mio pc, i colleghi non hanno questo problema dai loro computer. Ho controllato le impostazioni sembrano tutte corrette anche perchè tale problema non sussiste dalla casella personale di thunderbird e le impostazioni sono le stesse. Come posso risolvere? Grazie per la collaborazione

Cordiali Saluti Roberto
creator: roberto.brindisi95

title: from nowhere, i can´t open my colleague emails.
content:
From no where, my colleague who sends me many emails each days, just stay on "loading". If i open it in "new Window" i can read. But it will not load in the first page in my thunderbird app.

I have cleaned my computer for more space, i have deleted all in my trashbin, updated the application, deleted thunderbird and downloaded it again but nothing works.

It is only his email that all of sudden doesn´t work...
creator: johan.olofsson

title: Advanced search directly in the global search function (from:XXX to:YYY subject:"foo" after:20d)
content:
Is there any hope for us to have syntax which allows for advanced search through all the folders of a different account? Something that allows powerusers to type something like: "from:XXX to:YYY subject:"foo" after:20d" and get results?

I'm currently parsing all my email with notmuch locally to get something like this. It would be great to be able to get this type of functionality in Thunderbird natively. There are some adons that I have found but they seem like hacks; search needs to be super reliable.

  • Apologies if this is has been asked before!
creator: camachorod

title: Thunderbird calendar taking a long time to populate
content:
Thunderbird version: 146.0 Platform: Windows 11 Email Provider: Google workspace

I'm slowly persuading my wife to move over from outlook to Thunderbird (due to constant issues with google sync). I've got it all setup nicely and working BUT i'm having a real issue with the thunderbird calendar taking an absolute age to populate It is quite a well used calendar with lots of recurring events/reminders to pay bills etc. Just to get the Holidays in United Kingdom takes about 30 seconds and to populate from the gmail calendar takes around 8 minutes

It's the one stumbling block i'm finding to persuade her to move over so any advice that can be given would be greatly appreciate
creator: info9330

title: richiesta continua di Tunderbird di nuova password per una mia casella Pec con Aruba
content: Salve a tutti, ho un problema di accesso alla mia PEC offerta da ARUBA. Mi viene chiesto da Thunderbird di rinnovare la password con molta frequenza l'ultimo cambio risale a 2 giorni fa ed oggi di nuovo stessa richiesta. Ovviamente se non procedo con il cambio non si accede alla mail. Entrando direttamente sulla mia pec ARUBA (non passando da Thunderbird) funziona tutto regolarmente, ma purtroppo da quando ho aggiornato la casella pec di Aruba agli standart europei (avevo letto che serviva cambiare password circa ogni 3 /6 mesi se si utilizza altri provider ) ma purtroppo spesso la devo cambiare più volte anche nella stessa settimana. Ci sono soluzioni ? grazie a tutti e saluti.
creator: walter.severi

title: non ricevo email

non viene più scaricata la posta da 3 giorni dà questo messaggio: si è verificato un errore durante la connessione a live.thunderbird.net. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Codice di errore: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   La pagina che si sta cercando di visualizzare non può essere mostrata in quanto non è possibile verificare l’autenticità dei dati ricevuti.    Contattare il responsabile del sito web per informarlo del problema.

come posso fare? grazie
